title: MIPS Integra teases more integrated helmet protection, renames Air, Evolve & Essential
content:
MIPS has given their anti-rotation, friction-layer helmet safety systems a naming overhaul to make it easier to differentiate levels of protection & performance, and at the same time unveiled a new Integra system to be built seamlessly into new helmets.Â MIPS Air, Evolve & Essential are simply new names to better highlight the current MIPS systems, […]

The post MIPS Integra teases more integrated helmet protection, renames Air, Evolve & Essential appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
